column1: #Text=[0251] As shown in FIG. 31, this module contains the master tables used to configure the wind farm, in addition to the forms and subroutines necessary to alter and install this configuration.
#Text=These tables are linked to by the other modules as needed.
#Text=This module is similar or identical to the RDA Con FIG.mdb.
#Text=This allows a new project to be added one time and then all the config files updated.
#Text=Preferably, there will be only one configuration file that is centrally located.
#Text=[0253] As shown in FIG. 32 this process contains the routines necessary to administer the SWPR application.
#Text=Included in this module are processes to archive the monthly and yearly data.
#Text=The module also configures the Config Data for new/existing projects.

#Text=[0255] As shown in FIG. 33, this process contains the routines necessary to display formatted information in predefined formats, i.e., Flash Report, Production Detail, Warranty Detail, Downtime Detail.
#Text=This process is distributed to users who require access to the data.
#Text=The process may have a version indicator which will notify the user if there is an update available (or include an automatic update).
#Text=The process restricts the user from making changes to the data.
#Text=The process has user level access to restrict access to reports/parks.
#Text=Alternatively, this could be available in a web based format.
#Text=A sample report menu is shown in FIG. 34.
